bill.title: Providing for a sales and compensating use tax rate of 6.85% and a rate of 5.9% on food; eliminating certain itemized deductions; decreasing the rate of tax on resident individuals; tax amnesty.
bill.description: Providing for a sales and compensating use tax rate of 6.85% and a rate of 5.9% on food; eliminating certain itemized deductions; decreasing the rate of tax on resident individuals; tax amnesty.

history.action: Senate Introduced
Senate Referred to Committee on Assessment and Taxation

Senate Committee Report recommending bill be passed by
Senate Committee of the Whole - Be passed
Senate Final Action - Passed;  Yea: 29 Nay: 11
